name: CastleRush
description:
Boss-rush game w/ a possession mechanics that lets you possess, and thus control, multiple playable characters to defeat 3 bosses.

Controls:

Movements - WASD

Attack - J

Special Attack - K

Dash - L

Possess - semi-colon

Credit:

Szadi art's tileset - https://szadiart.itch.io/pixle-castle-2d

UilleagDowin's boss asset - https://uilleaggodwin.itch.io/roguelike-dungeon-asset-bundle

OcO's character asset - https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack-4

https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack-2
